rule.description: Iwe unogona kuisa izvi kuburikidza nekudzvanya-kurudyi menyu pane chero peji rewebhu, iyo URL yewebhu peji inozowedzerwa semutemo nekumisikidza .

url.title: URL modhi, yakazara URL.
url.explain: Iyi nzira inogona kuenderana ne URL yakazara.

example.a: {{1}}, zvinoenderana nepeji rekutanga reYouTube uye mapeji madiki ese.

regexp.title: Nguva dzose kutaura, tapota ona Ona kuti ushandise.

onlyForCurrentRule.title: Inoshanda chete kune mutemo wazvino:
onlyForCurrentRule.explain: Kana ikatariswa, inogona kushandiswa chete kumutemo wezvino, kana zvisina kudaro mitemo yose yepasi rose inogona kushandiswa.
